channel.title: ASSET MANAGEMENT on Mount&Blade Bannerlord Modding Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in ASSET MANAGEMENT on Mount&Blade Bannerlord Modding Documentation

item.title: CREATING A MODULE - QUICK GUIDE
item.description: Modules can contain assets ranging from meshes to physics bodies, scenes, gameplay entities like factions, lords, troops, items and scripts and behaviours that can run any gameplay logic. In this gide, the process of creating one will be explained.
